sections.heading: park system; violations; penalty
sections.text: Any person violating sections 37-337 to 37-348 or the rules and regulations governing the public use or administration of a state park shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1959, c. 436, § 13, p. 1468;Laws 1977, LB 39, § 295;R.S.1943, (1996), § 81-815

37-348.State park system; violations; penalty.

Any person violating sections 37-337 to 37-348 or the rules and regulations governing the public use or administration of a state park shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 1959, c. 436, § 13, p. 1468;Laws 1977, LB 39, § 295;R.S.1943, (1996), § 81-815.33;Laws 1998, LB 922, § 106.
